title: The COVID Tracking Project
description: The COVID Tracking Project collects information from 50 US states, the District of Columbia, and 5 other US territories to provide the most comprehensive testing data we can collect for the novel coronavirus, SARS-CoV-2. We attempt to include positive and negative results, pending tests, and total people tested for each state or district currently reporting that data.

title: Open Collective Fiscal Sponsorhip
description: For the next 3 months (till the end of June), we are removing our 5% fiscal sponsorship fee. Open Collective is also removing their 5% platform fee during this crisis. So it will be free for all those collectives to receive and disburse money.

title: Project N95
description: Rapid response teams have been coordinating with manufacturers globally with the capacity to produce millions of NIOSH-approved N95 masks and other critical medical equipment.

title: US Digital Response
description: If you work in government, and need top-notch, vetted help to get through the COVID-19 crisis, you’re in the right place. Just fill out this intake form and we’ll figure out the rest.

title: Coronavirus.gov
description: Official clearing house for coronavirus news and alerts.

title: East Oakland Collective
description: The East Oakland Collective provides food and other direct aid to some of our most vulnerable populations.
tags: Mutual Aid,Treatment and Prevention,Financial Relief,Volunteer Opportunities

title: Peoples Breakfast Oakland
description: Peoples Breakfast Oakland provides mutual aid in the form of food, shelter, clothing and other advocacy for unhoused folks in West Oakland.

title: PopCare
description: Popcare intends to provide a basic income of $1,000 per month to teachers, students, and workers who have been laid off due to COVID-19.

title: Phat Beets Produce CSA
description: Phat Beets Produce provides delivery of locally grown fruits and vegetables to food desert neighborhoods in Oakland and the broader East Bay.  They also have a generous pricing model that enables them to provide free access to undercapitalized folks.

title: National Association of County and City Health Officials
description: NACCHO has created a tool to help you search for local health departments in your area. Find contact information for local health departments using the map below and check to see that your health department is listed correctly.

title: Together SF
description: We are a group of San Franciscans connecting people and resources to soften the impact of COVID-19 on local businesses and our most vulnerable neighbors.

title: Berkeley Mutual Aid
description: The Berkeley Mutual Aid Network is a platform to help neighbors connect during the Coronavirus pandemic so that no one in our community has to face this crisis alone.

title: Berkeley Relief Fund
description: Community coming together to support small businesses, arts nonprofits, and residential tenants during the COVID-19 pandemic. (donations are tax deductible)
